p: Next, using a pipette, we carefully removed the medium and then washed the surface twice with 500 μL of DPBS (AppliChem GmbH, Darmstadt, Germany). Subsequently, we fixed cells with paraformaldehyde in DPBS (AppliChem GmbH, Darmstadt, Germany) for 10 min and then aspirated and washed them again with DPBS prior to permeabilization with 15 μL of 0.1% Triton X-100 (Sigma, Saint Louis, MO, USA) at 4 °C for 5 min.
